f4313e3b-4537-4edb-a503-2f47502b76af.description: Earners of this badge have a fundamental understanding of the C# Language using Object Oriented Programming Principles. Earners are able to demonstrate the correct creation of classes and methods associated with OOP. These candidates can utilize these foundation tools to create console applications, but also apply them to other application types using the C# language.
f4313e3b-4537-4edb-a503-2f47502b76af.name: Foundations of C# Development

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Soft Skills Training Complete required Foundations of C# Programming training Created and Presented a Final Project Earned a Certification of Completion Certificate

6b8b0749-096b-42f0-a4c3-39fcf015e77c.description: Earners of this badge have a fundamental understanding of Amazon Web Services & IT Fundamentals. Earners are able to prepare for the CompTIA ITF+ exam, which is a pre-career certification focusing on foundational IT knowledge and common tasks performed daily by both advanced and entry-level IT professionals. Earners will obtain knowledge of AWS terminology, customizing the AWS console, working with AWS resources, and utilizing core services.
6b8b0749-096b-42f0-a4c3-39fcf015e77c.name: Amazon Web Services and IT Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required training in AWS Cloud ITF+; Complete Lab exercises; Complete study materials for Certification Exam. Earned a Certification of Completion Certificate

b0522f50-9ac3-43cd-b6c4-32e8b64c341b.description: Earners of this badge have a fundamental understanding of networking and how to applies to real world industry environments. Earners are able to demonstrate the securing of networks, working with switches, hubs and routers. Earners also will apply the application of these principles to secure computing environments.
b0522f50-9ac3-43cd-b6c4-32e8b64c341b.name: Foundations of Cyber Security & Networking

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required training in Cyber Security and Networking; Complete Lab exercises; Complete study materials for Certification Exams. Earned a Certification of Completion Certificate

21fdfec8-a4d4-4448-8e54-e269bd9163c7.description: Earners of this badge have a fundamental understanding of the JavaScript programming language using web development principles. Earners are able to demonstrate the correct creation of websites and NodeJS applications. These candidates can utilize these foundation tools to create console applications in NodeJS and websites using the fundamentals of JavaScript.
21fdfec8-a4d4-4448-8e54-e269bd9163c7.name: Foundations of Javascript Development

17620b42-c909-4852-9693-b687d1c7217f.description: Earners of this badge have a fundamental understanding of becoming a Project Management Professional. Earners are taught the foundations of Project Management through the PMBOK Guide, including Ethics and Strategies to manage, motivate and to develop a team through Standard recognized by the Project Management Institute. This course prepares candidates to pass the PMP and CAPM exams administered by the Project Management Institute by teaching them everything they must know to pass the CAPM and
17620b42-c909-4852-9693-b687d1c7217f.name: Foundations of Project Management Professional

db6b8d18-4ced-4ae5-b343-7ffd7f952171.description: Earners of this badge have a fundamental understanding of end user support of PC, mobile, and IoT devices, support of basic IT and networking infrastructure, baseline security skills, and troubleshooting core IT services. Upon completion of the course, earners can elect to take the CompTIA A+ certification exams.
db6b8d18-4ced-4ae5-b343-7ffd7f952171.name: IT Support Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required training in IT Support Course Material; Complete required quiz and final quiz; Preparation for the A+ Certification Exam; Earn a Certificate of Completion

cd68e014-f116-4b9e-8499-9edd3985547d.description: Earners of this badge have a fundamental understanding of the Ruby programming language using web development principles. Earners are able to demonstrate the correct creation of Model View Controllers (MVC) and console applications. 86e7073d-c95d-4266-934f-82f048580d26.description: Earners of this badge have a fundamental understanding of Salesforce Administration. Earners will possess broad knowledge of customizing Salesforce, regularly configuring the platform, and managing users. Earners are able to demonstrate the ability to add users and filter dashboards. These candidates can utilize these skills in the Salesforce Environment.

5823493a-24c1-4f37-90af-20238684510d.description: Earners of this badge have a fundamental understanding of the Agile Product Life Cycle for software development, enterprise, and governmental environments. Earners will learn the values and principles of the Agile Manifesto which supports the team’s understanding and quick adaptation to change in an ever-changing work environment for overall business agility. Earners will be prepared for the Agile Certified Practitioner Certification (ACP) provided by the Project Management Institute (PMI)

c4da683c-e26a-49d9-911a-a15c6ad14e36.description: Earners of this badge have a fundamental understanding of how websites are built. 33be5f02-ce36-428f-8bb9-559dd1690980.description: Earners of this badge have a fundamental understanding of Linux processes and basic command-line concepts before progressing into the use of enterprise-level tools. These Candidates will be able to perform the basic responsibilities associated with being a Linux administrator.
